info.title: Teachify API Documentation
info.description: API documentation for Teachify application - A comprehensive educational platform API

get.description: Retrieve list of levels available for the current channel (includes system defaults and channel-specific levels)

post.description: Create a new channel-specific level. System default levels cannot be created via API.

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific level

put.description: Update level information. System default levels cannot be modified.

patch.description: Partially update level information. System default levels cannot be modified.

delete.description: Delete a level. System default levels and levels in use by class grades cannot be deleted.

409.description: Level is in use by class grades

level_id.description: ID of the level to associate with this class grade

name.description: Optional name for the class grade

level_id.description: ID of the level to associate with this class grade

name.description: Optional name for the class grade

level_id.description: ID of the level to associate with this class grade

name.description: Optional name for the class grade

get.summary: List all users in the current channel
get.description: Returns a paginated list of users belonging to the current channel. All users are automatically scoped to the authenticated user's channel.

post.summary: Create a new user in the current channel
post.description: Creates a new user and automatically assigns them to the current channel. The user must be authenticated and belong to a channel.

role_id.description: Role ID - must exist in roles table

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing JWT token

get.description: Returns details of a specific user. User must belong to the current channel.

404.description: User not found or doesn't belong to channel

put.summary: Update a user in the current channel
put.description: Updates user information. Password is optional - if not provided, it won't be changed. User must belong to the current channel.

password.description: Optional - only required if changing password

404.description: User not found or doesn't belong to channel

delete.summary: Delete a user from the current channel
delete.description: Deletes a user. You cannot delete your own account. User must belong to the current channel.

404.description: User not found or doesn't belong to channel

get.description: Returns a paginated list of all available roles in the system.

post.description: Creates a new role with specified permissions. Role names must be unique.

get.description: Returns details of a specific role including its permissions.

put.description: Updates role information. System roles (owner, teacher, assistant, viewer) cannot be modified.

422.description: Cannot modify system role or validation error

delete.description: Deletes a role. System roles (owner, teacher, assistant, viewer) cannot be deleted. Roles assigned to users cannot be deleted.

422.description: Cannot delete system role or role is assigned to users

post.description: Create multiple attendance records at once

get.summary: Get attendance statistics for a student
get.description: Retrieve attendance statistics for a specific student

get.summary: Get attendance statistics for a group
get.description: Retrieve attendance statistics for a specific group

description.example: Teacher with access to students and lessons
Teacher with access to students and lessons
